title: Assassin Hero
description: Assassin Hero is a roguelike action game that immerses you in the secretive world of the Assassin Brotherhood. Traverse perilous landscapes, from ancient Egypt to medieval cities, Valhalla's hills, and the feudal Orient. Confront classic foes like Templars, pirates, murderers, and mythical creatures. Brace for epic battles against formidable bosses as you relentlessly pursue legendary assassin status. Refine your hit-and-run skills, endure unrelenting enemy hordes, and etch your legacy in Valhalla.
